How to play Disc defender

How to protect a disc!

Disc defender in the settings menu you have two tabs available. The first "DIFFICULTIES" is responsible for the current difficulty level. The second "CONTROL MODE" allows you to select one of the three control modes. By default, the button control mode is enabled.

Gyroscope control

Rotate and control the disc via waving your device

Buttons control

Rotate and control the disc via tapping on the buttons

Draggable control

Rotate and control the disc on finger move (drag)
